name: Poly-zoom
tagline: Bring an incredible zoom (60fps) to your project using this element
body:
# poly-zoom Bring an incredible zoom (60fps) to your project using this element **Usage:** * *upper-limit* is the maximum zoom posible * *revere* is the direction of the zoom with the mouse wheel ````

Hello!
